edition - a) a print of a book; b) the size, style or form in which a book is published (as ಜನಪ್ರಿಯ ಆವೃತ್ತಿ); c) any of the versions of a text book, reference book, etc. that is maintained by periodic revision (as ನಾಲ್ಕನೆಯ ಆವೃತ್ತಿ); d) any of the various regular issues of a news paper (as ಭಾನುವಾರದ ಆವೃತ್ತಿ); e) an issue of a news paper published by one of various places of its regular publication (as ಬೆಂಗಳೂರು ಆವೃತ್ತಿ).
